This contains text for subtitles. Use descriptive expressions like <frantic laughter> and ## for a new line.
Increases Critical Hit Chance while wielding One Handed Weapons by
装备单手武器时爆击几率提高
Increases Critical Hit Chance while wielding Two Handed Weapons by
装备双手武器时爆击几率提高
Increases the amount of Rage gained per strike by
每次攻击获得的怒气提高
Increases the Maximum Rage Points by
Allows Two Handed weapons to be One Handed
能够用单手装备双手武器
Increases the duration of Negative Effects inflicted to the enemies by
对敌人的负面效果的持续时间延长
Increases Damage dealt against enemies under the effect of Fear by
对受到恐惧效果影响的敌人的伤害提高
Increases natural Rage transfer into Umbra by
将自然怒气转化为本影提高
Reflects Damage to the enemy by
反弹给敌人的伤害提高
Increases Umbra transferred into Rage when taking Damage by
受到伤害时本影转化为怒气提高
Grants an Armor Bonus from a fraction of your Health. Bonus Armor :
从你的生命值获得部分护甲。额外护甲：
You can assign any skill to this slot
你可以将任何技能分配给该栏位
You can unlock this slot from the passive skills tree
你可以从被动技能树中解锁该栏位
Reduces the time before you start losing Rage and regenerating Umbra by
开始损失怒气和恢复本影前的时间缩短
Reduces your natural Rage loss by
被动技能效果 (增益魔法 & 负面魔法)
Increases your armor depending on your maximum health.
根据你的最大生命值提高你的护甲。
Increases you rage generation on each hit.
每次攻击提高你的怒气恢复。
降低你的自然怒气损失。
Greatly increases your natural Rage loss.
大幅提高你的自然怒气损失。
Increases the Umbra cost of your spells.
提高你的法术的本影消耗。
Increases the number of fireballs you will launch next time you use Multi Fireball.
提高你下次使用多重火球术的火球数量。
Returns a part of incoming damage.
Keep attacking with your weapon to perform new combo attacks.
用武器不断攻击来发动新的连击。

用武器不断攻击来发动新的连击。
Increases the bleeding damage you inflicts.
提高你造成的流血伤害。
Greatly increases your defense against frontal attacks.
大幅提高你对前方攻击的防御。
Deals you bleeding damage over time.
Increases the critical damage you deal.
提高你造成的爆击伤害。
Chance to freeze target on hit
有一定几率在攻击时冻结目标
Chance to auto-heal when health is low
有一定几率在生命值较低时自动治疗
Chance to burn target on hit
有一定几率在攻击时燃烧目标
Chance to shock target on hit
有一定几率在攻击时震击目标
有一定几率在攻击时击晕目标
You can't move or cast skills
你无法移动或施放技能
Inflicts Damage over time and may lower all your resistances
受到持续伤害，并有可能降低你的所有抗性
